summary: Adds spells that allow you to buff NPCs with things like magic resistance, water walking, and other stuff.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/v1gB5PG.png[/img]﻿

[color=#9fc5e8][size=6][u][b]Description[/b][/u][/size][/color]
This mod adds 15 spells that allows you to cast buff spells on any NPCs. Followers, guards, townspeople, chickens....anyone and anything.
Now you can be full support for a team of followers or whatever. Or you can go around and give temp buffs to random NPCs.
Try not to cast them on enemies though. Baaad idea.

I debated on making all of these alteration spells, but I decided to set them in their respective schools. I figure casting the spell on your self and then on others wouldn't change the school/method of casting. I think it makes sense that anything you can cast on yourself should be castable on others.


[color=#9fc5e8][size=6][u][b]The Spells[/b][/u][/size][/color]

[center][b][u][color=#9fc5e8][size=5]RESTORATION[/size][/color][/u][/b]
[b][size=4]
[font=Arial][color=#cfe2f3]Grant Sun Cloak[/color][/font][/size][/b][font=Arial]
[size=2]Effect: NPCs under this effect will deal damage to undead creatures around them
Base Magicka: 88
Range: 800 feet (To cast)
Duration: 1 Minute[/size][/font]


[b][u][color=#9fc5e8][size=5]Illusion[/size][/color][/u][/b]
[font=Arial][b][size=4]
[color=#cfe2f3]Grant Invisibility[/color][/size][/b]
[size=2]Effect: NPCs under this effect will invisible like the downtrodden of our society :(
Base Magicka: 140
Range: 800
Duration: 1 Minute

[b][color=#cfe2f3][size=4]Grant Muffle[/size][/color][/b]
[size=2]Effect: NPCs under this effect will move silently
Base Magicka: 65
Range: 800
Duration: 5 Minutes[/size]
[/size][/font]

[color=#9fc5e8][size=5][b][u]Destruction[/u][/b][/size][/color]
[b][size=4]
[color=#cfe2f3]Grant Flame Cloak[/color][/size][/b]
[font=Arial][size=2]Effect: NPCs under this effect will have flames around them that damages nearby enemies
Base Magicka: 99
Range: 800 
Duration: 30 Seconds[/size][/font][font=Arial]
[/font]
[b][color=#cfe2f3][size=4]Grant Shock Cloak[/size][/color][/b]
[font=Arial][size=2]Effect: NPCs under this effect will have lightning around them that damages nearby enemies
Base Magicka: 99
Range: 800 
Duration: 30 Seconds[/size][/font][font=Arial]
[/font]
[b][color=#cfe2f3][size=4]Grant Frost Cloak[/size][/color][/b]
[font=Arial][size=2]Effect: NPCs under this effect will have frost around them that damages nearby enemies
Base Magicka: 99
Range: 800 
Duration: 30 Seconds[/size][/font][font=Arial]
[/font]
[b][color=#cfe2f3][size=4]Grant Wind Cloak[/size][/color][/b]
[font=Arial][size=2]Effect: NPCs under this effect will have violent winds around them that can knock NPCs on their butts
Base Magicka: 125
Range: 800 
Duration: 15 Seconds[/size][/font][font=Arial]
[/font]
[b][u][color=#9fc5e8][size=5]Alteration[/size][/color][/u][/b]
[b][size=4]
[color=#cfe2f3]Grant Lesser Armor Buff[/color][/size][/b]
[font=Arial][size=2]Effect: NPCs under this effect will have 100 extra armor on them reducing physical damage
Base Magicka: 155
Range: 800 
Duration: 1 Minute[/size][/font]

[b][color=#cfe2f3][size=4]Grant Armor Buff[/size][/color][/b]
[font=Arial][size=2]Effect: NPCs under this effect will have 50 extra armor on them reducing physical damage, but not the emotional damage from spending time with NPCs instead of friends and family :(
Base Magicka: 85
Range: 800 
Duration: 3 Minutes

[/size][/font][b][color=#cfe2f3][size=4]Grant Fire Resist[/size][/color][/b]
[font=Arial][size=2]Effect: NPCs under this effect will have 50% fire resistance 
Base Magicka: 55
Range: 800 
Duration: 3 Minutes

[b][color=#cfe2f3][size=4]Grant Shock Resist[/size][/color][/b]
[font=Arial][size=2]Effect: NPCs under this effect will have 50% shock resistance 
Base Magicka: 55
Range: 800 
Duration: 3 Minutes[/size][/font]

[b][color=#cfe2f3][size=4]Grant Frost Resist[/size][/color][/b]
[font=Arial][size=2]Effect: NPCs under this effect will have 50% frost resistance 
Base Magicka: 55
Range: 800 
Duration: 3 Minutes

[b][color=#cfe2f3][size=4]Grant Magic Resist[/size][/color][/b]
[font=Arial][size=2]Effect: NPCs under this effect will have 40% magic resistance 
Base Magicka: 70
Range: 800 
Duration: 3 Minutes[/size][/font][/size][/font][/size][/font]

[b][color=#cfe2f3][size=4]Grant Ethereal[/size][/color][/b]
[font=Arial][size=2]Effect: NPCs under this effect will be immune to all damage and unable to harm others
Base Magicka: 155
Range: 800 
Duration: 30 Seconds

[b][color=#cfe2f3][size=4]Grant Water Walk[/size][/color][/b]
[font=Arial][size=2]Effect: NPCs under this effect will be able to walk on water unlike all these so called devines out here fakin' and frontin'
Base Magicka: 10
Range: 800 
Duration: 2 Minutes[/size][/font][/size][/font][/center]

[color=#9fc5e8][size=6][u][b]Location[/b][/u][/size]
[/color]Right outside Riverwood at the camp. Check the screenshots


[color=#9fc5e8][size=6][u][b]Compatibilities[/b][/u][/size][/color]
Should work with everything. It's just one esp file and nothing else


[u][color=#9fc5e8][size=6][b]Requirements[/b][/size][/color][/u]
Skyrim and that's it.
(Recommended: Grim's Utilities for spell hot-keying or your favorite spell hotkey mod)


[u][color=#9fc5e8][size=6][b]Credits and Permission[/b][/size][/color][/u]
Bethesda and Todd Howard
Don't upload this anywhere please.
If you want to build on top of this, you can just do it, but just give me credit as Jinxxed0
author: Jinxxed0
